summary: A nice and not too big home for the Dovahkiin and his friends with a great view over Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][COLOR=Cornflowerblue][b]Welcome to House Whitewatch[/b][/COLOR][/size][/center]

[center][img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1222074-1388318344.jpg[/img][/center]

A beautiful and not too big home for the Dovahkiin and his friends with a great view over Whiterun.
It can be found near Riverwood alongside the road to Whiterun... across the river.
Surrounded by breathtaking scenery, it is a perfect place to relax after haunting adventures!
The house is fully navmeshed and cleaned with TES5EDIT...and works without any DLCs!

[size=4][b][color=Cornflowerblue]
Video by Hodilton[/color][/b][/size]
[youtube]E7bMyls_o2Y[/youtube]

[COLOR=Cornflowerblue][b]Features:[/b][/COLOR]
[list=1]
- All workstations
- Large pool area
- A nice and shiny lab
- A lot of custom storages
- Kitchen with a custom fireplace
- Bedroom for the player
- A decent guest room for up to three followers
- A bathroom with toilet and working shower
- Some plaques and racks
- Some water features
- A little treasury area
- A little grotto...
[/list]

[COLOR=Cornflowerblue][b]Recommended Mods:[/b][/COLOR]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38491/?]aMidianBorn Whiterun[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8954/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D8954%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Skyrim Redesigned[/url] (for noble furniture)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28642/?]Ultimate HD Fire Effects[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29608/?]Detailed Rugs[/url]

[COLOR=Cornflowerblue][b]Requirements:[/b][/COLOR]
- Skyrim

[COLOR=Green][b]Updates:[/b][/COLOR]
*Version 1.6
- All bugs should be fixed
- Added dragonperch markers
- Fixed a lightsource
- Added lorefriendly version (optional)
- Cleaned worldspace


[COLOR=Red][b]Bugs:[/b][/COLOR]
If you find any bugs, just let me know!

[COLOR=Cornflowerblue][b]Credits:[/b][/COLOR]

* InsanitySorrow for his awesome modders resources
* Tamira for her beautiful Statue model and resources
* Stroti for his Resources and Tamira for converting them
* Runspect for his great modders resources
* Oaristys & Tony67 for their wonderful modders resource pack!
* Blary for awesome clutter resources!
* mrpdean for his lakeview manor meshes
* Kraeten/mrsiika for Griffon Fortress resource

...and thanks to Elianora for her inspiring house-mods, Tamira for her inspiring work and helping hand, Hodilton for the vid, Tes Alliance and Darkfox127 for the tutorials!
author: Akhorahil666
